Webmaster’s Corner

Alternatives to Google Analytics

Tip of the Month

Optimize Your Google My Business Listing

You should always keep your Google My Business (GMB) listing up to date. Having up to date and accurate information will help you get more clients and visits to your business. It is not a difficult process, and it only takes a few minutes. If you haven't yet claimed or fully filled out your GMB listing, follow our step-by-step instructions today!

Did You Know?

Legal Forms for Consumers Are Available on Justia

To better equip consumers with access to free legal resources, Justia now offers a 50-state survey of legal forms for various common legal matters at both the state and federal levels.

Meet Our Team

Justia’s Stacy Stern is Now a Harvard Expert in Residence

We are proud to announce that our president, Stacy Stern, recently became an Expert in Residence with Harvard Innovation Labs. This program supports Harvard innovators, both students and alumni, by connecting them with entrepreneurs and business leaders who can help guide them as they explore their own journeys in the business world.
